alert.note: Alert for Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 29 at 2:16PM MDT until August 30 at 8:00PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 8 PM MDT WEDNESDAY... The National Weather Service in Riverton has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 8 PM MDT Wednesday. the Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * AFFECTED AREA: In Central WY Fire Zones...283...289. In North Central WY Fire Zones...275...282. * COUNTIES AFFECTED: In Central WY...Fremont...Natrona. In North Central WY...Big Horn...Hot Springs...Park...Washakie. In Southwest WY...Sweetwater. * IMPACTS: Strong west to southwest wind, low humidity, and above normal temperatures will create erratic fire behavior with existing fires or any new starts. * WIND: West 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * HUMIDITY: As low as 10 to 15 percent. * TEMPERATURES: Highs in the 80s.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected. A combination of strong winds...low relative humidity...and warm temperatures can contribute to extreme fire behavior.

area.areaDesc: Granite, Green, Ferris, Rattlesnake Mountains; North Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; South Big Horn Basin, Worland BLM; Upper Wind River Basin, Wind River Basin
